price: (44) And indeed, it is a remembrance[1441] for you and your people, and you [all] are going to be questioned.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
